title: “நாட்டின் தோல்வி” என்று ராகுல்காந்திக்கு ஆதரவாக ட்வீட் செய்த ரகுராம் ராஜன்?
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Before the numbers out, I can say with all my conviction, Rahul Gandhi has done everything possible and more in this election, and moreover everything he did was right, if people still fall for falsehood & bigotry, it’s not him losing, it’s the country losing.
